title: Celtics enter KD sweepstakes, Mark Jackson joins the show
description:
Celtics throw their hat in the Kevin Durant trade sweepstakes. Jalen & Jacoby talk about the real possibility of Kevin Durant heading to Boston. GM Jacoby calls up and offers a trade that is too good to be true. Of course Jalen wants more! Also, Mark Jackson joins the show to talk about the new documentary ‘NYC Point Gods’. He shares his all-time favorite New York point guards to play the game. Plus, he breaks down what’s next for Kevin Durant, Kyrie Irving and Donovan Mitchell. And, did Lakers head coach Darvin Ham send a shot at Russell Westbrook? He only wants players that want to be there so is that Russ? Find out all that and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
